description: Oracle DB searching MCP server (read-only query + schema search).
name: io.github.CodeMachine0121/oracle-mcp

environmentVariables.name: MCP_HTTP_URL
environmentVariables.description: HTTP binding URL for the MCP server (default: http://0.0.0.0:3001).

environmentVariables.name: ORACLE_CONNECTION_STRING
environmentVariables.description: Oracle connection string used by the MCP server (recommended to use a read-only DB user).

environmentVariables.name: ORACLE_DEFAULT_MAX_ROWS
environmentVariables.description: Default max rows returned by oracle_query (default: 200).

repository.url: https://github.com/<your GitHub username here>/<your repo name>
